blogPost.title: Cashless societies would be more efficient, but also more vulnerable to technical failures, cyber attacks and invasions of privacy https://t.co/1Wo4wqBOYr https://t.co/CAWQgM8S6d

localize.full_text: 无现金社会的效率会更高，但也更容易受到技术故障、网络攻击和侵犯隐私的侵害https://t.co/1Wo4wqBOYr https://t.co/CAWQgM8S6d。
無現金社會的效率會更高，但也更容易受到技術故障、網絡攻擊和侵犯隱私的侵害https://t.co/1Wo4wqBOYr https://t.co/CAWQgM8S6d。

previous.title: Both the Biden and Romney plans try to avoid politics and punishing low-income people with high effective marginal tax rates if they receive a pay rise https://t.co/Xz11FA8w49

localize.full_text: 拜登和罗姆尼的计划都试图回避政治，如果加薪，就用高实际边际税率惩罚低收入者https://t.co/Xz11FA8w49。
拜登和羅姆尼的計劃都試圖迴避政治，如果加薪，就用高實際邊際稅率懲罰低收入者https://t.co/Xz11FA8w49。
